page.title: 07Switch it on
page.content: In our house we have a switch which turns on the television, which gives us news and entertains us.We have a freezer where we put food to keep it frozen.Our family has a vacuum cleaner which sucks up little bits of rubbish. We have a mixer which blends food.Dad has a lawn mower which cuts the grass in our garden.Grandad has an electric carving knife-it cuts meat into slices.Mum has a washing machine which washes all our dirty clothes.We have a toaster.It toasts our bread-makes it brown and crunchy.You put in a slice of bread and after a while the toast pops up.My sister has a hair dryer which blows out hot air.The other electric appliances we have are:a sewing machine,iron,fridge,tumble dryer,fire,record player,cassette recorder,radio,computer,clock radio and Strimmer to cut the lawn edges.
